name: PrivateRadio
short_description: PrivateRadio is another web based jukebox. In addition to typical jukebox features, PrivateRadio uses a radio tuner metaphor for its 'stations'.  Each station can play to a mplayer/madplay daemon or easily scripted to shout to shoutcast/winamp.
